sn28.10:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma sariputto rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
sn28.10:1.2: Atha kho ayasma sariputto pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya rajagahe pindaya pavisi.
sn28.10:1.3: Rajagahe sapadanam pindaya caritva tam pindapatam annataram kuttamulam nissaya paribhunjati.
sn28.10:1.4: Atha kho sucimukhi paribbajika yenayasma sariputto tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam sariputtam etadavoca:
sn28.10:3.1: “‘Kim nu, samana, adhomukho bhunjasi’ti iti puttho samano ‘na khvaham, bhagini, adhomukho bhunjami’ti vadesi.
sn28.10:3.2: ‘Tena hi, samana, ubbhamukho bhunjasi’ti iti puttho samano ‘na khvaham, bhagini, ubbhamukho bhunjami’ti vadesi.
sn28.10:3.3: ‘Tena hi, samana, disamukho bhunjasi’ti iti puttho samano ‘na khvaham, bhagini, disamukho bhunjami’ti vadesi.
sn28.10:3.4: ‘Tena hi, samana, vidisamukho bhunjasi’ti iti puttho samano ‘na khvaham, bhagini, vidisamukho bhunjami’ti vadesi.
sn28.10:4.2: “Ye hi keci, bhagini, samanabrahmana vatthuvijjatiracchanavijjaya micchajivena jivikam kappenti, ime vuccanti, bhagini, samanabrahmana ‘adhomukha bhunjanti’ti.
sn28.10:4.3: Ye hi keci, bhagini, samanabrahmana nakkhattavijjatiracchanavijjaya micchajivena jivikam kappenti, ime vuccanti, bhagini, samanabrahmana ‘ubbhamukha bhunjanti’ti.
sn28.10:4.4: Ye hi keci, bhagini, samanabrahmana duteyyapahinagamananuyogaya micchajivena jivikam kappenti, ime vuccanti, bhagini, samanabrahmana ‘disamukha bhunjanti’ti.
sn28.10:4.5: Ye hi keci, bhagini, samanabrahmana angavijjatiracchanavijjaya micchajivena jivikam kappenti, ime vuccanti, bhagini, samanabrahmana ‘vidisamukha bhunjanti’ti.
sn28.10:5.1: So khvaham, bhagini, na vatthuvijjatiracchanavijjaya micchajivena jivikam kappemi, na nakkhattavijjatiracchanavijjaya micchajivena jivikam kappemi, na duteyyapahinagamananuyogaya micchajivena jivikam kappemi, na angavijjatiracchanavijjaya micchajivena jivikam kappemi.
sn28.10:6.1: Atha kho sucimukhi paribbajika rajagahe rathiyaya rathiyam, singhatakena singhatakam upasankamitva evamarocesi:
